problem_text_cn: 如图正方形ABCD的顶点C在直线a上,且点B,D到a的距离分别是1,2．则这个正方形的边长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the vertex C of the square ABCD is on the straight line a, and the distances from vertices B and D to a are N_0 and N_1 respectively. Then the edge length of this square is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查直角三角形全等的判定和勾股定理的应用．
